pages.text: 89|24|geuttaeya ingan-eun nae milaeui saeng-eul wihayeo seonhaeng-eul xCgeoya xCgneunde lago hantanhayeo malhana
89|25|geunal-eun eoneu nugudo gahal sueobsneun hananim-ui eungbeolman-i iss-eul geos ila
89|26|eoneu nugudo hal su eobsneun geu bun-ui sogbag-i iss-eulila
89|27|uiloun yeonghondeul-egeneun yeonghondeul a neohuineun wanjeonhan hyusiggwa gippeumsog e iss-eulila laneun malsseumgwa
89|28|gippeohago jeulgeowohamyeo junimkke lo dol-aga
89|29|nawa hamkke haneun jadeul gaundedeul-eowa
89|30|naui cheongug-eulo deullaneun malsseum i iss-eul geos-ila
90|1|i do-eub-eul dugo maengsehasa
90|2|geudaeneun i do-eub-ui jayuloun geoju-in-ila
90|3|seonjowa jason-eul dugo maengsehasa
90|4|sillo hananim-eun ingan-eulo hayeogeum nolyeoggwa silyeonsog-eseo saldolog chang johayeossnani
90|5|eoneu nugudo bulsinjaleul jeabhal su eobsdago saeng-gag haneunyo
90|6|sillo naneun manh-eun jaesan-eul tangjin hayeossseubnida lago bulsinjaneun malhal geos-ila
90|7|eoneu nugudo geuleul jikyeoboji anihandago bulsinjaneun saeng-gaghaneunyo
90|8|hananim-i geuege du nun-eul ju ji ani haessdeonyo
90|9|hanaui hyeowa du ibsul-eul juji ani haessdeonyo
90|10|hananim-eun geuege du gil-eul seolmyeonghayeossnola
90|11|geuneun himdeun gil-eseo sugohalyeo ani haneunyo
90|12|geu himdeun gil-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
90|13|geugeos-eun noyeleul haebangsikyeo ju neun il-iyo
90|14|baegopeun ja-ege eumsig-eul bepu neun geos-imyeo
90|15|chincheog-ui goadeulgwa
90|16|meonji tuseong-iga doen gananhan jadeul-ege jaseon-eul bepuneun geos-ila
90|17|geuleon hu mid-eum-eulo seologa seolo-ege innaehago seologa seolo-ege salang-eul bepuneun geos-eulo
90|18|ideulman-i upyeon-e issneun donglyo deul-ila
90|19|geuleona hananim-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-eun jwapyeon-e issneun donglyo deullo
90|20|geudeul wieneun dadhyeojin buljiog man-i iss-eul ppun-ila
